content.raw: Fair enough, the work has been more or less ready to pull for almost a year, but the main roadblock and the reason I haven’t pushed for merge is that Siconos remains a bit of a moving target API-wise, so I’ve been trying to get it packaged for Debian but it’s an amazingly long process.  I’ll update this branch and open a new pull request when it seems feasible to actually pull it.
